column2: an A.M. Eatery////We ordered the Benny Duo and the pancake flight
column4: classic breakfast favorites.  They have about 8-10 different kinds of eggs benedict
column5: and the benny duo allows you to pick two kinds on one plate.  And the pancake flight is three smaller (though not small!) pancakes--I picked the chocolate chip
column6: sweet potato and pancake of the day (bacon!). My favorite was
column8: the sweet potato pancake--it was the lightest and fluffiest of the trio and topped with pecans.
